perturbation.original_text: The Parties expressly agree that any and all uses or disclosures of the Confidential Information by a Party will be done in accordance with the terms of this Agreement and the provisions of all applicable federal and state laws and regulations.
perturbation.changed_text: The Parties agree that uses or disclosures of Confidential Information will be in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This clause originally stipulated compliance with federal and state laws regarding confidential information, likely including HIPAA given the dental context. Removing this requirement creates a potential conflict with HIPAA regulations, which mandate specific protections for patient health information. By omitting the reference to legal compliance, the contract allows for uses and disclosures of confidential information that might violate HIPAA.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)
